org.lindbergframework.core.configuration
Class AbstractCoreConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.core.configuration.ConfigurationRepository
      org.lindbergframework.core.configuration.AbstractCoreConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration, CoreConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleCoreConfiguration, XmlCoreConfiguration
public abstract class AbstractCoreConfiguration
extends ConfigurationRepository
implements CoreConfiguration

Abstract core configuration class that provides the base operations for core configuration implementations.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
